lead_paragraph: The speaker’s belief that Congress should weigh in on the use of force against the Islamic State may put him on a collision path with other congressional Republicans.
snippet: The speaker’s belief that Congress should weigh in on the use of force against the Islamic State may put him on a collision path with other congressional Republicans.

headline.main: Paul Ryan Orders Closer Look at Authorizing War Against ISIS
headline.print_headline: Ryan Orders Look at Authorizing War Against ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

abstract: House Speaker Paul D Ryan instructs majority leaders Rep Kevin McCarthy and Rep Ed Royce, chair of Foreign Affairs Committee, to begin talking to House members about viability of measure that will authorize war against Islamic State group.
